product_name: Phorm S 300 Bike Saddle - Women's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Designed specifically for women, this saddle offers supportive foam cushioning and a center cutout to relieve pressure to ensure you ride comfortably from beginning to end.
short_description: Designed specifically for women, this saddle offers supportive foam cushioning and a center cutout to relieve pressure to ensure you ride comfortably from beginning to end.
